conclusion: Analyze the image to understand the flow of liquid through the baffles.
The image shows different colored tubes labeled A, B, C, D, and E, each with arrows indicating the direction of flow.
The task is to predict which container (D or E) the liquid will flow into after passing through the baffles.
Examine the arrows labeled A, B, and C to determine the direction of flow through the baffles.
Trace the path of the liquid through the baffles based on the arrows.
The liquid will flow from the point where the arrows point to the container labeled D.
The liquid will flow into container D after passing through the baffles.
